screen.name: CCcamInfoMain
screen.applet: from enigma import eListboxPythonMultiContent, gFont self["menu"].l.setFont(0, gFont("Regular", 33)) self["menu"].l.setFont(1, gFont("Regular", 33))

screen.name: CCcamInfoShareInfo
screen.applet: from enigma import eListboxPythonMultiContent, gFont self["list"].l.setFont(0, gFont("Regular", 33)) self["list"].l.setFont(1, gFont("Regular", 33))

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.applet:
from enigma import getDesktop, eSize, ePoint desktop_w = getDesktop(0).size().width() desktop_h = getDesktop(0).size().height() listcount = 0 itemheight = 78 maxwidth = desktop_w - 120 minwidth = desktop_w // 2
listwidth = self["list"].instance.size().width() + 120 # 120 for button width and padding if listwidth > maxwidth: listwidth = maxwidth
if listwidth < minwidth: listwidth = minwidth
if self["list"] and self.list is not None: listcount = len(self.list)
if listcount > 10: listcount = 10
if not self["text"].text: textsize = (listwidth, 0) else: textsizeoriginal = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (listwidth, textsizeoriginal[1])
listsize = (listwidth, itemheight*listcount)
self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(0, 0)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1] + 30))
wsizex = listwidth wsizey = textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 60 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((desktop_w-wsizex)//2, (desktop_h-wsizey)//2))

eLabel.text: Slyk Q by Kidda C (2019). linuxsat-support.com. Beer kitty. paypal.me/kiddac
Slyk Q by Kidda C (2019). linuxsat-support.com. Beer kitty. paypal.me/kiddac
Slyk Q by Kidda C (2019). linuxsat-support.com. Beer kitty. paypal.me/kiddac

PIN entry is required to access this area

Use these settings to protect younger viewers
from watching inappropriate programmes and
from making unauthorised purchases.
Use CH+/- or < > to toggle between the lists.\n\nMenu for more options.

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import getDesktop, eSize, ePoint desktop_w = getDesktop(0).size().width() desktop_h = getDesktop(0).size().height() listcount = 0 iconsize = 53 itemheight = 45 padding = 45
maxwidth = desktop_w - 120 minwidth = desktop_w // 2
listwidth = self["list"].instance.size().width() + (iconsize + padding) if listwidth > maxwidth: listwidth = maxwidth
if listwidth < minwidth: listwidth = minwidth
maxtextwidth = listwidth minheight = iconsize
if self["list"] and self.list is not None: listcount = len(self.list) if itemheight*listcount > minheight: minheight = itemheight*listcount
if not self["text"].text: textsize = (maxtextwidth, 0) else: textsizeoriginal = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (maxtextwidth, textsizeoriginal[1])
listsize = (maxtextwidth, itemheight*listcount)
self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, 0)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, textsize[1] + 30))
wsizex = listwidth wsizey = textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 60 if wsizey < minheight: wsizey = minheight wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((desktop_w-wsizex)//2, (desktop_h-wsizey)//2))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 18), size = (960, 660), font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 69), size = (960, 660), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (15, 23), size = (120, 120), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Bold",33),gFont("Regular",30)], "itemHeight": 156 }

widget.convert: {"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (80, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 1), size = (150, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is csystem MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is hop 1 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is hop 2 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (330, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is hop 3 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (370, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is hop 4 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (410, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 6), # index 6 is hop 5 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (480, 1), size = (70, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 7), # index 7 is sum of cards for caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (550, 1), size = (80, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 8), # index 8 is reshare MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 1), size = (1024, 50), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 9), # index 9 is providers ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",27)], "itemHeight": 54 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15,5), size = (972,38), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15,41), size = (972,90), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",33), gFont("Regular",24)], "itemHeight": 105 }

MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 78), size = (1002, 0), png = 5), # index 5 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",30),gFont("Regular",24)], "itemHeight": 78, "scrollbarMode": "showNever" }
